channel.title: #138: “Epic Guide” Marketing
channel.description:
[Listen to this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/138-epic-guide-marketing/).
We discuss Ed Freyfogle’s recent experience creating the OpenCage Reverse Geocoding guide, an example of an “epic guide” approach to content marketing.
Useful links:
* The OpenCage Reverse Geocoding guide: https://opencagedata.com/reverse-geocoding * Adam Duvander, who helped Ed create the guide: https://twitter.com/adamd * Adam’s company: https://everydeveloper.com/ * Adam’s personal site: http://www.adamd.org/
